alert.note: Alert for Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued December 22 at 3:19PM EST until December 25 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM FRIDAY TO 7 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches...mainly south and west of Routes 68 and 56. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Southeastern St. Lawrence and Southwestern St. Lawrence Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM Friday to 7 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized blizzard-like conditions are possible due to blowing snow resulting in very low visibilities.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
